tops: light blue t-shirt with cartoon character
pink zip-up hoodie with front pockets
gray pullover hoodie with front pouch
red and black flannel button-up shirt
navy polo shirt with small logo on chest
orange football jersey with number on front
oversized black t-shirt with band logo
bottoms: black basketball shorts with white stripe
gray jogger sweatpants with cuffed ankles
black cargo pants with side pockets
blue track pants with white side stripes
shoes: gray running shoes with white soles
high-top black sneakers with white laces
blue and neon green running shoes
accessories: black and silver baseball cap with 'Rocky' on it
red baseball cap with curved brim
lanyard with keys and ID badge

sample_sentence_patterns: Clothing at time of disappearance: {tops}, {bottoms}; footwear: {shoes}.
According to family, the child left home in a {tops}, {bottoms}, and {shoes}, carrying a {accessories}.
Surveillance shows the child in a {tops} with {bottoms}, wearing {shoes} and a {accessories}.
research_note: Clothing descriptions are important for case identification and witness reports. Truthful callers often provide clear sensory details including clothing descriptions, while false allegation callers may provide minimal sensory detail. Clothing descriptions help establish timeline and last known appearance of the child.
